name: The Liberty, a Luxury Collection Hotel
description: Housed in the historic Charles Street Jail, The Liberty combines historic architecture with modern luxury. Steps away from the Charles River Esplanade and boutique shopping.

name: Boston Harbor Hotel
description: Boston's premier waterfront hotel. Enjoy stunning harbor views, a full-service spa, and world-class dining right on the water.

name: The Omni Parker House
description: America's longest continuously operating hotel. Famous for its Boston Cream Pie and old-world charm, located right on the Freedom Trail.

name: Fairmont Copley Plaza
description: A symbol of Boston's rich history and elegance. Located in Back Bay, just steps from the Boston Public Library and Newbury Street shopping.

name: The Envoy Hotel, Autograph Collection
description: A visionary hotel in the Innovation District. Features a popular rooftop bar with skyline views and modern, art-forward interiors.
